alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:29AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 315 AM MST... At 228 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tempe, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Laveen, Mesa Riverview Mall, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Arizona Mills Mall, Salt River Indian Community, Downtown Mesa, South Phoenix, Downtown Phoenix, Downtown Scottsdale, Arizona State University, Fiesta Mall, Sky Harbor Airport, Chandler Fashion Center Mall and Guadalupe. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 145 and 162. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 199. AZ Route 51 near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee
